Html:
Hey guys, I am trying to build a managed library to be "binary compatible" with a VB6 COM DLL ... This DLL is part of a boxed software product, and they provide a VB6 project for you to put your code in ... Although I have done this in the past, I want to see if I can build out a managed DLL that will be "binary compatible" 

anyone over there have experiance with this?
